subject:
odd messages I get in fedora core 6 and subgestion for installation
	how to
body:
Hi, One subgestion for the installation how to is rather then yum update
-y it should be yum upgrade -y so dependences are also downloaded and
updated.  Yum-updatesd is now the service name that downloads updates and
you do need to configure it in /etc/yum/yum-updatesd.conf if you want it
to install and download everything.  I have been receiving these messages
and I think they are kernel or filesystem related.  Anyone know what this
message means and how to fix it?  I am using the 2.6.19 fedora core 6
latest kernel with speakup.
audit(1176593174.739:6): avc:  denied  { getattr } for  pid=5347
comm="pam_console_app" name="/" dev=hda1 ino=2
scontext=system_u:system_r:pam_console_t:s0-s0:c0.c1023
tcontext=system_u:object_r:fs_t:s0 tclass=filesystem
